headers.subject: [xwiki-notifications] [Issue] Closed: (XWIKI-3085) Add support for line break syntax (\\)

quote.quotepara: Add support for line break syntax (\\)

Key: XWIKI-3085 URL: http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-3085 Project: XWiki Core Issue Type: Bug Components: Rendering 2.0 Affects Versions: 1.7 Reporter: Vincent Massol Assignee: Vincent Massol Fix For: 1.7.1, 1.8 M1

* Fix the other renderers which are having bugs in their
onNewLine()/onLineBreak() implementation. * Remove the LineBreakBlock since the strategy is for renderers to decide
whether to output a LB or a NL
